com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Bp550BTControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Bp550BTControl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DeviceControl

    public class Bp550BTControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DeviceControl
    Public API for the BP550BT

    The class provides methods to control BP550BT device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a BP550BT device, you need to calliHealthDevicesManager#discoveryiHealthDevice to discovery a new BP550BT device, and then calliHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect BP550BT device.
